intro.content:
Minimum Viable Resume

Working as a Human Head of AI at Dali Games.

I am open to giving talks at conferences.

Feel free to contact me at pmigdal@gmail.com and connect on LinkedIn. See also my PDF resume.

highlights.content:
A few highlights

  • Developed livelossplot, a popular Python library for visualizing deep learning model training, with over 1.5M installations.
  • Created Data Science PL, the largest data science community in Poland with over 20k members.
  • Alumnus of the renowned MIT Research Science Institute and recipient of the bronze medal in the International Physics Olympiad.
  • 15 of my projects and posts have been featured on the Hacker News front page.
  • My research publications span a wide range of disciplines from quantum physics to mathematical psychology, educational games, and data visualization.
